content.html: Any web developers care to help a buddy out? I'm trying to run my WP site locally, and I'm able to visit the homepage like so http://localhost:10003. But any interior page strips out the port number. Like http://localhost:10003/blog turns into http://localhost/blog Any ideas?
content.value:
Any web developers care to help a buddy out? 

I'm trying to run my WP site locally, and I'm able to visit the homepage like so http://localhost:10003.

But any interior page strips out the port number. Like http://localhost:10003/blog turns into http://localhost/blog

Any ideas?
